title: TREX Introduces TREX SIGNATURE DECKING | ProBuilder - Pro Builder
summary: Trex, maker of high-performance, low-maintenance composite decking and railing, has introduced its latest innovationâ€”Trex Signature decking. This premium offering pioneers a realistic wood grain that raises the bar for beauty, performance and sustainability. Backed by an industry-leading 50-year limited residential warranty and complemented by the full range of Trex Signature railing, Signature is engineered to endure the rigors of time and nature.

title: The European startups transforming supply chains, according to VCs - Sifted
summary: Supply chains are susceptible to disruption and often not particularly climate-friendly. A growing number of startups are working to make supply chains run as smoothly, and greenly, as possible. Three European investors focused on logistics share the up-and-coming startups on their radar.
green_innovation: TRUE, Minimizing environmental impacts and promoting sustainability through efficient energy consumption, waste reduction, and the use of renewable resources.
business_innovation: TRUE, New or improved products or processes that differ significantly from the firm's previous offerings and have been introduced to the market or brought into use by the firm.
green_product: TRUE, Designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces environmental impact throughout its life cycle, using environmentally benign materials, sustainable production processes, and product functionalities that support recycling and low environmental impact during usage and disposal.
green_process: TRUE, A method or technique in manufacturing, production, or any other operational activity that minimizes environmental impacts and promotes sustainability, reducing waste, conserving natural resources, decreasing energy consumption, and limiting the release of harmful substances into the environment.
product_or_process: Software to enable food and beverage companies to reduce their environmental impact.
